overview: Check out time doesnâ€™t seem to apply to the spirits of this haunted hotel. Second Sight Paranormal TV and psychic medium, Ericka Boussarhane visit  Mobile, Alabama for a night inside the Malaga Inn. The team soon has some heart-racing spirit encounters.
tagline: "There are some Spirits that never check out"
title: The Haunting of Malaga Inn
